database.name: massive
database.description: The Massive Database contains information about all the proteomics/metabolomics datasets in massive

entry.name: Selective killing of cancer cells by a small molecule targeting the stress response to ROS
entry.description: Raj L, Ide T, Gurkar AU, Foley M, Schenone M, Li X, Tolliday NJ, Golub TR, Carr SA, Shamji AF, Stern AM, Mandinova A, Schreiber SL, Lee SW. Nature. 2011 475:231-4. doi: 10.1038/nature10167. PMCID: PMC3316487

additional_fields.field: A protein modification that is produced by reaction with iodoacetamide, usually replacement of a reactive hydrogen with a methylcarboxamido group.
A protein modification that effectively replaces one hydrogen atom with a hydroxyl group.
